definition_text: Information that is linked or reasonably linkable to an identified or identifiable individual
cross_references: Excludes de-identified data per § 6-1-1303(11); Excludes publicly available information; Excludes employee/B2B data in certain contexts

definition_text: Personal data revealing: racial or ethnic origin; religious beliefs; mental or physical health condition or diagnosis; sex life or sexual orientation; citizenship or citizenship status; genetic or biometric data processed for purpose of uniquely identifying individual; or personal data from known child
cross_references: Requires opt-in consent per § 6-1-1308(1); Subject to data minimization per § 6-1-1308(3); Subject to secondary use prohibition per § 6-1-1308(4)

definition_text: Exchange of personal data for monetary consideration OR OTHER VALUABLE CONSIDERATION by controller to third party
cross_references: Broader than VCDPA (includes non-monetary value like CCPA); Excludes certain disclosures to processors or for specific purposes; Subject to opt-out right per § 6-1-1306(1)(d)(II)

definition_text: Person that alone or jointly with others determines the purposes and means of processing personal data
cross_references: Must meet applicability thresholds per § 6-1-1304; Owes duties per § 6-1-1305 and § 6-1-1308

definition_text: Person that processes personal data on behalf of controller
cross_references: Bound by data processing agreement per § 6-1-1305(2); Must assist controller with consumer rights requests; Must assist with DPAs

definition_text: Individual who is a Colorado resident acting only in an individual or household context
cross_references: Excludes individuals acting in commercial or employment context; Has rights under § 6-1-1306

definition_text: Any operation or set of operations performed on personal data including: collection; use; storage; disclosure; analysis; deletion; modification; sharing
cross_references: Broad definition covers all data activities; Subject to controller duties

definition_text: Data that cannot reasonably be used to infer information about or otherwise be linked to an identified or identifiable individual or device
cross_references: Exempt from CPA if technical and organizational measures applied; Controller must commit to not re-identify; Cannot combine with other information to identify

definition_text: Person other than: consumer; controller; processor; or affiliate of controller or processor
cross_references: Recipients in data sales or sharing; Controller liable for third-party misuse

definition_text: Displaying advertisements to consumer based on personal data obtained from consumer's activity across non-affiliated websites applications or online services
cross_references: Subject to opt-out right per § 6-1-1306(1)(d)(I); Requires DPA per § 6-1-1309

definition_text: Automated processing of personal data to evaluate analyze or predict personal aspects concerning economic situation health preferences interests reliability behavior location or movements
cross_references: Subject to opt-out right if produces legal or similarly significant effects per § 6-1-1306(1)(d)(III); Requires DPA per § 6-1-1309

definition_text: Clear affirmative act signifying freely given specific informed and unambiguous agreement to process personal data
cross_references: Required for sensitive data per § 6-1-1308(1); Must meet Rule 7.03 standards; Cannot use dark patterns; Must be revocable

definition_text: Mechanism that communicates or signals consumer's choice to opt out of processing personal data for purposes of targeted advertising or sale
cross_references: Controllers must honor by 2024-07-01 per Rule 5.01; Examples: Global Privacy Control (GPC); Must be single request; No account required
